Package org.codemonkey.simplejavamail

Class Summary
Email Email message with all necessary data for an effective mailing action, including attachments etc.
EmailAddressValidationCriteria Defines a set of restriction flags for email address validation.
EmailValidationUtil Validates an email address according to RFC 2822, using regular expressions.
Mailer Mailing tool aimed for simplicity, for sending e-mails of any complexity.
 

Enum Summary
TransportStrategy Defines the various types of transport protocols and implements respective properties so that a Session may be configured using a TransportStrategy implementation.
 

Exception Summary
MailException This exception is used to communicate errors during the sending of email.
